panels.title: Persistence Metrics

list.name: Host
list.query: show tag values from system with key = "host"

list.label: JolokiaAgentHost
list.name: Jolokia
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jolokia" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: TomcatHost
list.name: tomcatHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tomcat_connector" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: MongoDB Host
list.name: MongoDBHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mongodb" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: RedisHost
list.name: RedisHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "redis" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Apache Httpd
list.name: HttpServer
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "apache" WITH KEY = "host"

title: Monitoring Java Stack - Jolokia JVM, Redis, Mongodb, Tomcat,Apache Httpd
description: This dashboard provides key metrics  for monitoring Java Stack - Jolokia JVM, Redis, Mongodb, Tomcat,Apache Httpd, using InfluxDB and Telegraf.
